briefdescription.para: The monomials of the Polynomial as a std::map<int, Monomial> where the key is the degree of the Monomial.
Default constructor for when initialized with no arguments.
Normal constructor for initialization with a std::map<int, Monomial>
List constructor for initialization with a std::initializer_list<Monomial>
Vector constructor for initialization with a std::vector<Monomial>
Copy constructor for when initialized with an lvalue Polynomial object.
Move constructor for when initialized with an rvalue Polynomial object.
Assigment operator overload for when called with an lvalue.

simplesect.para: (Polynomial&) A reference to the lvalue of the operation

briefdescription.para: Move assigment operator overload for when called with an rvalue.

simplesect.para: (Polynomial&) A reference to the lvalue of the operation

briefdescription.para: Equal logic operator overload.

parameterdescription.para: The Polynomial object to compare to.

simplesect.para: (true) If Polynomial objects degrees and monomials match.
(false) If Polynomial objects degrees and monomials dont match.

briefdescription.para: Not equal logic operator overload.

parameterdescription.para: The Polynomial object to compare to.

simplesect.para: (true) If Polynomial objects degrees and monomials dont match.
(false) If Polynomial objects degrees and monomials match.

briefdescription.para: Greater than logic operator overload.

parameterdescription.para: The Polynomial object to compare to.

simplesect.para: (true) If the Polynomial object degree is greater than the degree of the passed Polynomial.
(false) If the Polynomial object degree is equal or less than the degree of the passed Polynomial.

briefdescription.para: Less than logic operator overload.

parameterdescription.para: The Polynomial object to compare to.

simplesect.para: (true) If the Polynomial object degree is less than the degree of the passed Polynomial.
(false) If the Polynomial object degree is equal or greater than the degree of the passed Polynomial.

briefdescription.para: Greater or equal than logic operator overload.

parameterdescription.para: The Polynomial object to compare to.

simplesect.para: (true) If the Polynomial object degree is greater or equal than the degree of the passed Polynomial.
(false) If the Polynomial object degree is less than the degree of the passed Polynomial.

briefdescription.para: Less or equal than logic operator overload.

parameterdescription.para: The Polynomial object to compare to.

simplesect.para: (true) If the Polynomial object degree is less or equal than the degree of the passed Polynomial.
(false) If the Polynomial object degree is greater than the degree of the passed Polynomial.

briefdescription.para: Getter function for getting the degree of the Polynomial.

simplesect.para: (int) The degree of the Polynomial.

briefdescription.para: Getter function for getting the monomials of the Polynomial.

simplesect.para: (std::map<int, Monomial>) The monomials of the Polynomial.

briefdescription.para: Function for knowing if the polynomial has or not any monomials.

simplesect.para: (bool) If the polynomial is empty.

briefdescription.para: Function for appending a lvalue monomial to the Polynomial.

simplesect.para: (bool) If the operation was successful.

briefdescription.para: Function for appending a rvalue monomial to the Polynomial.

simplesect.para: (bool) If the operation was successful.

briefdescription.para: Getter function for getting the expression of the Polynomial.

simplesect.para: (std::string) The expression of the Polynomial.

briefdescription.para: Calculus function for getting the value of the Polynomial at a point.

simplesect.para: (double) The result of the evaluation of the Polynomial.

briefdescription.para: Calculus function for getting the derivative of the Polynomial.

simplesect.para: (Polynomial) The result of the derivative of the Polynomial.

briefdescription.para: Calculus function for getting the integral of the Polynomial.

simplesect.para: (Polynomial) The result of the integral of the Polynomial.

briefdescription.para: Calculus function for getting all the real and complex roots of the Polynomial using the Eigen library.

detaileddescription.para:
(std::vector<double>) All the roots as doubles in a std::vector
Does not handle the edge case when called with a constant polynomial (polynomial of degree zero).
(std::vector<double>) All the roots as doubles in a std::vector

briefdescription.para: The class destructor.
A friend operator to insert the Polynomial into a std::stringstream.

simplesect.para: (std::stringstream&) A reference to the std::stringstream.

briefdescription.para: A friend operator to insert the Polynomial into a std::ostream.

simplesect.para: (std::ostream&) A reference to the std::ostream.

briefdescription.para: The swap function for the copy-and-swap idiom implemented by the assigment operators.

parameterdescription.para: The other Polynomial to swap the data with.

briefdescription.para: The redux function for removing the Monomials of zero coefficient.
Class for representing and operating polynomials.

detaileddescription.para: The class consists of the constructors, the operators, the getters, the properties and some private functions.
